item.title: Forza Horizon 5: 15 Best Cars With Widebody Kits
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Forza Horizon 5 offers deep car customization options, including branded widebody kits like Liberty Walk and Rocket Bunny that enhance both visuals and performance.
  • Cars such as the Cadillac ATS-V, Toyota GR Supra, and Nissan GT-R gain significant improvements with these widebody kits, boosting both their appearance and capabilities on the racetrack.
  • Even exotic supercars like the Lamborghini Aventador and McLaren 650S can benefit from these conversions, reaching new levels of performance and style.

Forza Horizon 5 is one of the best open-world arcade racers to date, featuring hundreds of different cars, racing events, quest storylines, and unique rewards to unlock. With some of the most impressive visuals in the genre and great physics that can be tweaked to provide either an arcade or simulation experience, the latest entry in the iconic series by Playground Games is here to stay.

Every car in Forza Horizon 5 can be customized on the inside, with flexible options including complete engine or transmission swaps. However, when it comes to visual customization, the game isn't as deep. It usually offers minor options like changing the front bumper, rear wing, and rims. Despite this, some cars in the game have widebody kit options available that transform their looks and impact their performance on the road. Below are some of the best cars in Forza Horizon 5 with such options, with each car being available for purchase directly from the Autoshow.

Updated September 8, 2024, by Vlad Mazanko: Full widebody kits may be rare in Forza Horizon 5, but they're among the best options for players looking to enhance both a car's appearance and performance. These kits often provide vehicles with a sportier or more aggressive look, combined with an aggressively low stance. Below, more such positions have been added, offering players affordable choices to elevate both the visual appeal and performance of their next upgradeable ride.

15 Cadillac ATS-V 2016

Forza Edition Widebody Kit

  • Price: 65,000 CR
  • Class: A 716
  • Top Speed: 185 mph

With few Cadillacs available in the game, the Cadillac ATS-V stands out as a luxurious yet powerful vehicle that epitomizes executive class. Affordable and equipped with the full Forza Edition widebody performance kit, the ATS-V is a force to be reckoned with. The conversion includes oversized front and rear bumpers, large diffusers, a massive rear wing, and an extended wheelbase with a low stance. This pack not only enhances the car's straight-line speed, but also reduces its weight for improved handling.

With some additional upgrades, the Cadillac ATS-V becomes one of the best-rounded road vehicles in the A class, boasting enough horsepower to confidently outpace many competitors.

14 Toyota GR Supra 2020

HKS Widebody Kit

  • Price: 55,000 CR
  • Class: A 731
  • Top Speed: 187 mph

The Toyota GR Supra is a brand-new car in Forza Horizon 5 that wasn't available to players in Forza Horizon 4. It's also one of the starting cars granted to every player. It's affordable, packs a punch, and features an HKS widebody kit with several presets (including a drift variant). What else could anyone want from a sports car?

The new Supra's wide range of advantages has led to it being one of the most popular vehicles in the Modern Sports Cars category in Forza Horizon 5 , and rightfully so. With some upgrades, it can shine even in the S2 class alongside some ten times more expensive rides.

13 Audi RS7 Sportback 2013

Forza Edition Widebody Kit

  • Price: 225,000 CR
  • Class: A 739
  • Top Speed: 205 mph

The Audi RS7 Sportback doesn't have a branded widebody kit, but comes with the exclusive Forza Edition conversion body parts. This unique pack offers some of the most powerful performance and handling upgrades, conveniently installed with just a few clicks. Though costly, it provides a quick and efficient way to transform the stock version into a racing-ready sportscar capable of dominating the S1 class.

The Forza Edition conversion includes standard enhancements: large diffusers, a rear anti-wing, a widened wheelbase, and a low, competition-ready stance. These upgrades elevate the Audi RS7 Sportback's performance to a new level, making it a serious contender on the track.

12 Lexus RC F 2015

Rocket Bunny Widebody Kit

  • Price: 75,000 CR
  • Class: A 741
  • Top Speed: 183 mph

The Lexus RC F is another vehicle in Forza Horizon 5 that benefits from the Rocket Bunny full widebody conversion kit. This affordable Super Saloon can be transformed into a formidable race car, begging to be put on the track. The widebody kit radically enhances the RC F's styling, featuring aerodynamic components and a massive rear wing for increased downforce, signaling this car's readiness to tear up the tarmac.

An upgraded Lexus RC F shines in top-tier A-class events, standing alongside street racing staples like BMW, Nissan, Toyota, and Audi. Players can invest further in the vehicle's performance, boosting its power to complement the improved aerodynamics. Given the RC F's low cost, players can allocate more resources to upgrades, pushing it to the top of the S1 class.

11 Porsche 911 GT2 1995

RWB Rauh Welt Begriff Widebody Kit

  • Price: 550,000 CR
  • Class: A 753
  • Top Speed: 182 mph

As the most expensive and slowest car here, the iconic Porsche 911 GT2 might not seem like the best option for extensive visual customization. However, that impression is deceptive. Its complete RWB widebody kit combines Japanese and Euro tuning elements, and alters this classic Porsche supercar's every part. With this, 911 GT2 becomes one of the most recognizable and stylish cars available in Forza Horizon 5 .

It's true that there are better options available if players are looking purely for performance. Still, 911 GT2 stands out in the Retro Super Cars category for those seeking something special.

10 Mercedes-Benz C 63 AMG Coupé Black Series 2012

LB Liberty Walk Widebody Kit

  • Price: 150,000 CR
  • Class: A 768
  • Top Speed: 210 mph

The Mercedes-Benz C 63 AMG is a sports car that's been a staple throughout the entire Forza Horizon series. In the latest game, the C 63 AMG feels as great to drive as always. It also features the signature Liberty Walk performance preset alongside a widebody kit with huge rear and front bumpers and a low stance.

From acceleration to handling and aerodynamics, the customized Mercedes-Benz C 63 AMG is one of the most exquisite choices in the Super Saloons category in Forza Horizon 5 . In any race, this beast will push the player to the top.

9 Porsche Cayman GTS 2015

Rocket Bunny Widebody Kit

  • Price: 80,000 CR
  • Class: A 767
  • Top Speed: 181 mph

The Porsche Cayman GTS is one of the most affordable entry-level Porsches in the game, and also features a full Rocket Bunny widebody kit. Interestingly, Forza Horizon 5 didn't include any Rocket Bunny kits at launch, but they were added post-release as part of the game's ongoing support.

The Rocket Bunny widebody kit dramatically alters the Cayman GTS's appearance with huge bumpers, a lowered stance, and a stylish rear anti-wing. While the kit doesn't significantly boost the car's performance — its top speed remains around 185 mph — the focus is on improving the Cayman GTS's already strong handling. With the widebody installed, the car offers even sharper steering, making it perfect for attacking corners at high speeds.

8 BMW M4 Coupe 2014

LB Liberty Walk Widebody Kit

  • Price: 92,000 CR
  • Class: A 782
  • Top Speed: 195 mph

The BMW M4 Coupe is one of several BMWs in Forza Horizon 5 to offer a full Liberty Walk widebody kit. It's also among the most powerful. With a top speed of 195 mph and a twin-turbocharged engine delivering 431 hp, it ranks as one of the standout A-class vehicles. The M4's exceptional grip on the track makes it ideal for tricky routes with tight corners.

By installing the full Liberty Walk conversion kit, players can maintain the car's signature traits while adding massive front and rear diffusers, along with a rear anti-wing. The kit also widens the car's wheelbase and boosts aerodynamics and downforce, all while giving the M4 a more predatory, aggressive look.

7 Chevrolet C8 Corvette Stingray Coupe 2020

StreetHunter Designs Widebody Kit

  • Price: 65,000 CR
  • Class: S1 806
  • Top Speed: 198 mph

The Chevrolet C8 Corvette Stingray is another affordable and high-performance vehicle with a widebody kit available. Most notably, this sports car gets a rare American-made StreetHunter Designs tuning preset, featuring eye-catching details such as huge front and back bumper diffusers, an aggressive low stance, and a massive rear anti-wing.

As one of the starting cars in the game, the Corvette Stingray is one of Forza Horizon 5's best options in the Modern Supercars category, ensuring players won't feel bored behind the wheel. From drag to drift and high-speed racing events, this is a real game-changer available to every player.

6 Nissan GT-R Black Edition R35 2012

LB Liberty Walk Widebody Kit

  • Price: 105,000 CR
  • Class: S1 810
  • Top Speed: 212 mph

One of the most iconic and recognizable supercars of the past few years, the Nissan GT-R Black Edition is a popular vehicle in every modern racing game it is part of. In Forza Horizon 5 , the Nissan GT-R can be enhanced via the Liberty Walk tuning pack, featuring the full widebody kit. And what a kit it is. From the huge anti-wing to well-balanced lines all around, the Nissan GT-R Black Edition is built to impress, rivaling much more expensive vehicles in the S1 class of the Modern Supercars category.

Moreover, the tuning pack not only visually enhances the Nissan GT-R Black Edition, but also includes a number of handling upgrades. It improves the vehicle's cornering abilities while not compromising the car's excellent straight-line performance.

5 Lamborghini Huracán LP 610-4 2014

LB Liberty Walk Widebody Kit

  • Price: 240,000 CR
  • Class: S1 838
  • Top Speed: 212 mph

The Lamborghini Huracán is also among the fastest serial supercars in Forza Horizon 5 to feature an option to install the full Liberty Walk upgrade preset, complete with a spectacular widebody kit. Even in its default configuration, the Lamborghini Huracán is a grippy monster with extremely responsive handling. With the LB upgrades, it can steer through corners with more speed than most vehicles in the Modern Supercars category.

As the successor to the well-known Lamborghini Gallardo, the Huracán lineup in Forza Horizon 5 includes several different variations of this supercar, some of which are among the hardest to obtain in the entire game. Luckily, even the base version is awe-inspiring.

4 Lamborghini Aventador LP700-4 2012

LB Liberty Walk Widebody Kit

  • Price: 380,000 CR
  • Class: S1 847
  • Top Speed: 232 mph

The fastest car among these, the Lamborghini Aventador , is a rather affordable exotic supercar in Forza Horizon 5 . It can be pushed to its limit with the Liberty Walk full upgrade preset, which includes the delightful widebody kit. Upon installation, players will experience even sharper steering and acceleration, making the standard Aventador one of the best choices for grip-based race events.

As with every modern Lamborghini, the upgraded Aventador is synonymous with luxury and is a notable example of the Hypercars category. It is suitable for the most high-speed events.

3 Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 1LE 2018

StreetFighter LA Widebody Kit

  • Price: 105,000 CR
  • Class: S1 849
  • Top Speed: 192 mph

The modern Chevrolet Camaro lineup is already iconic, representing the top tier among American muscle cars. However, the Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 is a standout track toy in Forza Horizon 5 for several reasons.

First, it is one of the very few cars in its class that can be enhanced with a widebody kit upgrade. Second, it features unique California-manufactured StreetFighter LA visual and performance upgrades. Installing these parts will push the Camaro ZL1 to the top of the Track Toys category in the S1 class. Very few vehicles are capable of matching this supercharged beast's acceleration and speed.

2 McLaren 650S Coupé 2015

LB Liberty Walk Widebody Kit

  • Price: 420,000 CR
  • Class: S1 859
  • Top Speed: 204 mph

The McLaren 650S is easily one of the most expensive cars among these, but the cost is more than justified. As one of the most impressive vehicles in the Modern Supercars category, upon installing the Liberty Walk upgrade preset with a widebody kit, the McLaren 650S could dominate the S1 class with its unparalleled performance.

Taking advantage of increased downforce at high speeds from the enhanced aerodynamics capabilities of the widebody kit, the McLaren 650S offers incredible driving dynamics. It features quick braking and acceleration, allowing the car to conquer the trickiest routes in Mexico with ease.

1 Porsche 911 GT2 RS 2018

Duke Dynamics Widebody Kit

  • Price: 315,000 CR
  • Class: S1 888
  • Top Speed: 219 mph

One of the best supercars overall that features the widebody kit option in Forza Horizon 5 is the Porsche 911 GT2 RS . Even in its default variation, this is one of the fastest 911 models in terms of top speed. It holds several records for the fastest rear-engined production car.

Standing almost at the top of the S1 class for the Track Toys category, the 911 GT2 RS can be brought one step further by installing the impressive Duke Dynamics performance and widebody preset. With these upgrades, it becomes a great choice for any high-speed racing event, and won't let any driver down.

item.title: Space Marine 2: Which Melee Defensive Style Is Best
item.description:
Quick Links

  • What Are Defensive Styles In Space Marine 2
  • Which Melee Defensive Style Is Best In Space Marine 2

Every weapon can be upgraded in Operations mode in Space Marine 2 . As you continue to use a specific weapon, it will gain XP and can be upgraded using a special currency to progress it to the next rarity. This XP can be earned by killing enemies with that specific weapon during an Operation, rewarding players for using their favorite weapons.

Just about every upgrade will increase some stats on a weapon, while possibly decreasing others, making players pick and choose which stats are most important and how they want their weapon to perform. The most important aspect of an upgrade is the Defensive Style, which will also be determined by the upgrades on a weapon.

What Are Defensive Styles In Space Marine 2

The defensive style of a weapon determines how the player can block or parry when using that weapon. There are three defensive styles that can be used: Balanced, Fencing, and Block . Each defensive style is locked to specific upgrades, meaning the stats and defensive style are a package deal that can be mixed and matched to make your ideal weapon.

While there won't be much flexibility with early weapons, and the standard issue for all weapons is balanced, later tiers for weapons will have an upgrade for each defensive style. The effects of each defense style are:

Defensive Style

Effects

Balanced

  • A small perfect parry window.
  • A small window to block an incoming melee attack

Fencing

  • A larger perfect parry window .

Block

  • Can't land a perfect parry.
  • Can hold down the block button to block all incoming melee damage from individual enemies.

Which Melee Defensive Style Is Best In Space Marine 2

Space Marine 2 has a heavy focus on aggressive melee combat that rewards the player with health and armor for killing enemies in melee and landing perfect parries. While blocking incoming damage can protect you, it doesn't give anything back. Overall, Fencing is the best option to get on any melee weapon , and players should prioritize it anytime they can.

Landing a perfect parry will leave an enemy open to a gun strike , which will have you pull out your sidearm pistol for a quick shot. These shots will deal much more damage than usual and can either kill or an enemy or set them up for an execution if they are weak enough. While there are some benefits to playing slow and blocking incoming damage, a wider window for perfect parries makes this play style much easier to master.

item.title: Monopoly GO: Beach Racers Event Guide
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Beach Racers Monopoly GO Rewards
  • How To Play Beach Racers Monopoly GO

The wait is finally over as another exciting mini-game has arrived in Scopely’s Monopoly GO . This time around, it’s called Beach Racers. This racing mini-game event will be active from September 5 to September 9 .

Just like the Partners Event, you'll need to invite your friends to join you in your journey. Players will compete in three races against different teams and unlock many stellar rewards, including the top prize of Premium Sticker Packs, a brand-new Beach Buggy board token, and even a Wild Sticker. Read this guide to learn all the rewards available in the Beach Racers Monopoly GO event and some easy instructions on how to play.

Beach Racers Monopoly GO Rewards

Here’s what each team will get for competing in Beach Racers Monopoly GO races:

Position

Rewards

1st Place

Five-Star Sticker Pack, Four-Star Sticker Pack, Beach Buggy Token, and a Wild Sticker

2nd Place

Five-Star Sticker Pack, Four-Star Sticker Pack, and Three-Star Sticker Pack

3rd Place

Four-Star Sticker Pack, Three-Star Sticker Pack, and Two-Star Sticker Pack

4th Place

Two-Star Sticker Pack, One-Star Sticker Pack

How To Play Beach Racers Monopoly GO

As we mentioned above, fans will need to create a team of friends to play Beach Racers in Monopoly GO and compete in a 3-Race Championship. Simply click on the ‘Plus’ icon to invite your friends. Once they accept your invite, you'll be ready to start the first race

Once the race begins, you can use 20 Flag Tokens to spin the popper. Each spin will move your team forward, and at the end of the first race, all teams will be ranked according to their positions on the track. Monopoly GO players who want to earn more Flag tokens can check out this guide.

To unlock championship rewards, you’ll need to complete all three races and collect medals. The team with the most medals at the end of the final race will win the grand prize, which includes five-star and four-star sticker packs, a new board token, and a Wild Sticker.

In Beach Racers, you earn medals after each race. As you can see in the image above, the team that finishes in first place gets 10 medals. The second-place team gets 8 medals, the third-place team gets 7 medals, and the fourth-place team gets 5 medals. To snag the top prize, you need to collect the most medals.

Furthermore, your team will also earn Lap rewards as you complete laps. After finishing a lap, players will get a prize box with options like dice rolls, Flag Tokens, and premium sticker packs.

item.title: 5 Best Open-World Games With Stylized Graphics
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Breath of the Wild offers natural exploration, deep combat, and cel-shaded visuals that stand the test of time.
  • The Saboteur visually shows Nazi oppression through black-and-white districts that restore color upon liberation.
  • Westerado: Double Barreled's simple revenge plot and pixel art create a replayable Western sandbox game.

Most people are well aware of the hold that open-world gaming has on the mainstream. Some of the most popular video games around feature massive sandboxes that are a joy to explore, with players finding something or the other to keep them distracted as they explore these locales and see everything they have to offer. However, the fact that this genre is so widespread means that the majority of games in this genre need to do something special to endear themselves to as many people as possible.

Graphics play a huge role in this department, and there's something to be said about games that feature realistic graphics that push the technical side of things to new heights. However, what makes an open-world game more memorable are stylized visuals that age like a fine wine and ensure that these games stand the test of time to be as iconic as can be.

1 The Legend Of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild

The Cel-Shaded Graphics Help The Visuals Stand Out

There are many reasons why Breath of the Wild stands out as one of the most iconic and beloved open-world games of all time. A focus on natural exploration, a combat system that seems simple but houses a ton of depth, and a bit of immersive sim design sprinkled on top of the package ensures that the game stands out as one of the best sandbox titles players can get lost in.

Of course, it would be impossible to praise the many strengths of Breath of the Wild without giving due credit to the amazing cel-shaded art style. It does a great job of helping this game stand out in the eyes of many, with the timeless visual design ensuring that Breath of the Wild and its sequel will look amazing no matter how many years have passed.

2 The Saboteur

Black-And-White Visuals Show The Oppression Of The Germans

One of the most underrated open-world video games of all time, The Saboteur lets players serve as a part of the French Resistance trying to regain their freedom and reduce the German presence tainting Paris's beauty. While the gameplay itself may not be the most imaginative thing about this game, what helps The Saboteur stand out is the unique manner in which it visually shows the oppression of the Nazis.

Paris is divided into districts that are under the control of the Germans, with these areas being depicted in black-and-white to show how life is being sucked out by these places. The protagonist, Sean Devlin, must liberate these areas by weakening the German presence and giving hope to the residents of Paris. Once the resistance gains steam in these districts, color is restored to these areas, which makes for a simple yet innovative way to visually reward the player for their efforts.

3 Westerado: Double Barreled

The Pixel Art Helps This Short Yet Sweet Sandbox Stand Out In The Eyes Of Many

It's a shame that more people don't know about Westerado: Double Barreled , which is one of the most replayable open-world games players can get their hands on. Despite only being a few hours in length, the concept of this game helps it stand out as an excellent Western video game with a simple revenge plot that is executed with great panache. After a mysterious man burns down the protagonist's ranch and kills their parents, players embark on a journey of revenge as they try to pinpoint the culprit.

This is achieved by exploring a sandbox and completing missions to figure out the identity of this person, with the sheer amount of freedom afforded to the player ensuring that every playthrough makes for a unique time. While certain aspects of a player's run may be similar, the journey to uncovering the traitor is unique every time, helping players enjoy this lovable homage to spaghetti westerns that stands out even more courtesy of a simple yet beautiful pixel art style that adds to the charm of this underrated open-world video game.

4 Sunset Overdrive

The Awesomepocalypse Transforms The World Into A Vibrant Playground

There's a reason why Insomniac Studios was chosen to work on the valuable Spider-Man IP, and fans who've played Sunset Overdrive had full confidence that this studio would do justice to the webhead's adventures. Despite the game technically being set in a post-apocalyptic scenario, the creative minds at Insomniac decided to use the awesomepocalyse to turn the world into a playground full of ziplines, grind rails, and everything else that aids movement.

What hammers in the unique qualities of Sunset Overdrive is its vibrant and eye-catching art style that enhances the colors of the game. For a world that is suffering from an apocalyptic event caused by an energy drink, it's fitting that this world exudes charm in its visuals and ensures that players are treated to an explosion of colors as they zoom and grind their way across Sunset City.

5 Need For Speed Unbound

Fans Were Glad To Play An NFS Game With Unique Visual Effects

Many people complained that the vast majority of racing games employed the same boring visual style that led to these titles looking similar. So, when Need for Speed Unbound showed off its stylistic visuals, fans were treated to one of the most visually distinct games in the series that injected some much-needed pizazz into its graphics.

While these effects can be removed, most players love how energetic the races in this game feel when the game's unique visual effects add some flair to each showdown. The grind of Need for Speed Unbound can be a pain to deal with, but players who look past some of the game's design flaws will find themselves enjoying one of the best racing games from a visual standpoint that serves as a breath of fresh air in a genre that doesn't innovate all that often from an asethetic standpoint.

item.title: King’s Choice Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
King's Choice is a mobile game that will put you on the throne and immerse you in the life of the royal court. In the game, you will find a fascinating story with a struggle for influence, royal audiences, and other attributes of the life of the nobility. In between, you will often have clashes with enemy knights. You cannot influence the course of the battle, but you can make your warriors stronger. To do this, you will have to spend many hours in the game or buy premium currency, but there is another way to speed up your progress. You can simply redeem King's Choice codes and get free rewards.

All King’s Choice Codes

Working King’s Choice Codes

  • QA3RJS - Enter this code to get 100 Gold, 2x Vincent of Beauvais, 2x Gin, and 2x Milk.

How to Redeem Codes in King’s Choice

Usually, it is more difficult to redeem codes in mobile games than, for example, in Roblox experiences. This is because, in mobile games, you often need to fulfill certain requirements or go through a tutorial. In King's Choice , there are no problems such issues, but the process is still a little complicated because the codes need to be redeemed on the website and not directly in the game. To help you redeem King's Choice codes quickly, we have created a step-by-step guide below.

  • Launch King's Choice and play until the game gives you the freedom of action.
  • On the main screen, look for the avatar image in the upper left corner.
  • Find your UID and click the button to the right of it to copy it.
  • Go to the official code redemption website.
  • Paste your UID in the upper field.
  • In the bottom field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Exchange.

Remember that King's Choice codes quickly expire, so redeem them as soon as possible to get rewards.

How to Get More King’s Choice Codes

If you want to receive new codes regularly for this fun free mobile game, simply bookmark this guide in your browser. We update it regularly to maximize your rewards.

King’s Choice is available on mobile devices.
